main_text:
Arguments against PAP
3. Arguments against PAP

Like most of the important conceptual claims of philosophy, PAP has
proved to be a tempting target, especially to philosophers wanting to
avoid its potential threat to responsibility
 (§1.1).
entry_title: Moral Responsibility and the Principle of Alternative Possibilities
